tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I live in Spain and during a work trip to Mumbai, I experienced severe pain in one of my wisdom teeth. Given my last wisdom tooth extraction experience which was quite painful (and with a long recovery time), I was extremely scared and hesitant to get another extraction. Dr. Bhumija logically explained why the extraction was needed immediately and assured me that my experience will be painless - her confidence and calm/friendly demeanor really helped me to go ahead with the extraction. I was pleasantly surprised (read shocked) when she said that the last anesthesia shot might give me slight discomfort (it didn't) because I did not realize that I already had got the first few shots - they were painless! I remember my last experience was harrowing where I was screaming during those shots. 

The overall procedure was fast and absolutely painless, unlike my prior experience in India and Spain. My recovery was super quick and I could resume work immediately. I was highly impressed by Dr. Bhumija's skillset, friendliness, warmth, and the fact she delivered on her promise of a painless experience.  Her clinic was aesthetically pleasing and her staff was super friendly.  I will not only fly down again but I will not hesitate to fly my family to Mumbai to get dental treatment from her :). Thank you so much,  savior! 100/10 experience.
reply_text: Thankyou so much for taking the time out for writing such a beautiful and complete feedback. Such words keep us motivated to make your each and every visit as comfortable and pleasant as possible.. keep smiling. Muchas gracias 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cavities,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: I visited Dr. Bhumija after a hiatus of 6 years, having moved around in different cities and unsurprisingly, things have only become better over time. The cleaniness at the clinic is still as impeccable and support staff is warm and friendly.I visited her for an extraction and Root Canal treatment and she assured me that it would be painless, and lived upto it. The entire 90 odd min procedure was completely painfree.What I liked about the process was that she explained the issues clearly, tried her best to avoid any unnecessary procedures, asked me to not bear any pain and call it out, if I felt something and acted like a thorough professional throughout the entire process.I was a little concerned going into the procedure for the first time, but her professionalism and skillset ensured calmness and made it a wonderful experience. She also makes her available to clarify any doubts after any procedure which is much appreciated.I was happy about my decision to revisit her and would strongly recommend visiting her for any dental issues.
reply_text:
Thankyou so much for taking the time out for writing such a beautiful feedback. Words like these inspire us to make each and every visit of yours as comforting and smooth as possible. 
Thanks for having the faith in us. Keep Smiling :)

review: By far the most amazing dentist I've come across. I am quite sensitive to dental treatments but Dr. Bhumija handled it with care and patience. So far during the treatment, not once have I felt any pain and discomfort. At first I found the treatment expensive but the kind of expertise Dr. Bhumija has and the way she treats her patients, it's all worth it. Throughout the treatment she played calm music and kept giving me breaks in between the treatment as I had a difficult treatment to be done. Today I'm filled with immense gratitude for the painless treatment, kindness and the patience Dr. Bhoomija has shown. I hope to visit her for further treatments. I highly recommend Dr. Bhoomija for all kinds of dental treatments and assure you that there would be no pain in any treatment an individual would go through at her clinic.

review:
In my experience, Dr. Bhumija is as skilled as they  come. She was finishing her treatment on another patient when I reached for my appoinment. My first impression of her - sympathetic, very well informed, knowledgeable. 
She calmly listened to my problems and the first thing she did was put me at ease with the situation. She talked to me throughout the treatment making sure I didn't feel uncomfortable even for a second.  No pain or discomfort btw...

Her suggestions post the treatment further eased my nerves as I felt I was being looked after. 
Consider following her Instagram account dedicated to oral health - dentistry_by_dr.bhumija

Extremely pleasant experience at her clinic. Highly recommended!

review: The doctor was very friendly with me, she explained the issue well to me and also the environment was very comfortable for me as a patient.I was having tooth decay and it was very close to reaching the nerve of my teeth which would cause me to have a  root canal if the tooth decay reached the nerve of my tooth.In my case the doctor handled it very professionally and also she was able to save my tooth without doing a root canal which was a major plus point for me as it saved my time and money.My procedure went very well and the doctor also addressed all my doubts clearly which made me very happy as a patient.
reply_text: Thankyou so much for the lovely feedback. Keep Smiling :)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was a root canal treatment. Dr Bhumija was able to skillfully save my tooth with the right intervention. At the right time she felt that the treatment was causing some pain so she recommended local anesthesia. That helped a lot. Post the treatment she took an XRay to confirm the exactness of the procedure. The treatment took nearly an hour and she kept checking if I am comfortable and can she go on. I would definitely go to her again given her high degree of skill, professionalism and empathy.

review: I got to know of Dr.Bhumija through a friend whom she had treated earlier . From being someone who had never visited a dentist to travelling all the way to Mumbai from Bangalore was a big step for me . I had a lot of dental issues for obvious reasons and I put all my faith in Dr.Bhumija. I am overwhelmed with the entire experience. The cleanliness and the ambience of the clinic was top notch. Right from administering anesthesia without any discomfort , to the plethora of treatments I underwent, everything was like a breeze. Unbelievably light and extremely skilful hands . She’s  like an artist performing the procedures effortlessly . I cannot thank her enough for fixing my numerous dental issues. I cannot believe myself saying this but I am already looking forward to the remaining two implant surgeries with her . I would highly recommend Dr.Bhumija for all  dental procedures .
reply_text: Thankyou for taking the time out to write these lovely words. Really means a lot. See you on your next visit:) Keep smiling

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: When you are having a bad dental pain, the last thing you want is a bad dentist. Thank god, I stumbled upon Dr. Bhumija's profile on Practo. Went to her with excruciating pain in one of my teeth. She did an X-Ray and explained that I would need a RCT. Since, I had an infection, she generously did it over two seatings, so that the process is painless. In the beginning, I was a little wary of the process, but Dr. Bhumija made sure I was comfortable and relaxed with her step by step explanation, conversations and of course the music. Overall, the  treatment was smooth and painless. But what made the experience better is her politeness and humour. Special mention, all the memes.
reply_text: Thankyou so much for taking the time out to write this kind feedback. I’m really glad we could alleviate your dental pain as well as your anxiety associated with it. Keep smiling.

I visited her two years ago complaining of severe toothache and she examined my teeth, explained the situation to me and then performed Root canal treatment and a gum surgery. As painful as it sounds, I was surprised to undergo the whole treatment without any pain. ( just mild discomfort which is natural)I really appreciate that the clinic is so well equipped with latest technology, there's always a follow up call before the appointments, and recently when I visited the clinic during the pandemic, proper safety measures were taken to ensure my safety as well as the safety of the other patients and the staff.Being scared of going to the dentist since childhood, I'm happy and thankful that I found someone like Dr. Bhumija Nair.

review:
*Dextrous Dentistry*
I guess that's what the apt title should be, for Dr. Bhumija Gautam's dental clinic. The way she comforted me all throughout my treatment and the way she explains the issue and how this is to be tackled really made me feel that I'm in safe hands. It's not only me but my son Abir too is a fan of hers. He loves the minty gargles and then he's all willing to sit for his treatment. The advices that she gave him for protection and better long-lived teeth only epitomises her genunity and her dedication towards her duties. *THANK YOU DR. BHUMIJA.* We truly are relieved to have you with us.
reply_text: Thankyou for taking the time out to write such a beautiful and complete feedback. We strive to make all our patients as comfortable with ethical and painfree treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have had many bad experiences with the dental services, in one I had excessive bleeding and pain just for a simple cleaning. By chance I got Dr. Bhumija’s profile on Practo. After examining my teeth she explained what was the issue and what procedure had to be done. She didn’t want to finish the procedure just for the sake of completing it. She split the sessions into 3 giving me time to cure some inflammation that had occurred before. She also gave a lot of helpful tips for me to do post completion of the sessions. She made sure that I was comfortable and the procedure was painless. She has an amazing sense of humour and is very nice with all patients which makes the visit to the clinic a smooth experience. I can’t forget the memes that runs on the display near the work station which she had put together(worth your time). Overall, she is an amazing doctor and I guess the streak of having a bad dentist has finally come to an end. Thank you Dr.
reply_text: Thankyou so much for taking the time out and writing such lovely and kind words. Really means a lot that I could alleviate your pain and your fears. Keep smiling :)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
What a great experience. It's not often you go to the dentist and absolutely nothing is uncomfortable. I came in with a painful situation and a Root Canal Treatment was suggested.Never felt any pain or discomfort during the procedure and had multiple sessions because of the underlying tooth abscess making it a complicated one.

I wish I had switched to them sooner. Great attention and service. You know you are in good hands when you learn things about your bone structure and jaw clinching that you had no clue about. Keen eye on detail! 
A good dentist is personable and is someone who can put people at ease and Dr.Bhumija sums up all of the above.
reply_text:
Thanks a lot for writing such a wonderful feedback.. Such words keep us motivated to only provide better and even more comfortable treatment each time.. 
We’re glad to have alleviated your pain and restore your smile :)
